name: leetcode-code-analyzer
description: AI-powered code analysis, error detection, and optimization suggestions for LeetCode problems

scripts.copy-assets: npm run copy-html && npm run copy-css && npm run copy-icons
scripts.copy-html: mkdir -p dist/popup dist/setup && cp src/popup/*.html dist/popup/ && cp src/setup/*.html dist/setup/
scripts.copy-css: mkdir -p dist/popup dist/content dist/setup && cp src/popup/*.css dist/popup/ && cp src/content/*.css dist/content/ && cp src/setup/*.css dist/setup/
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run build && zip -r leetcode-analyzer.zip dist/ assets/ manifest.json README.md
